tool.name: mzml2metfrag
tool.description: Conversion of mzML to MetFrag parameters
tool.command: echo "java -jar /usr/local/bin/MetFragParameterExport.jar InputFile=$mzmlfile OutputFile=/$outfolder MetFragDatabaseType=$MetFragDatabaseType ChemSpiderToken=$ChemSpiderToken MaximumSpectrumLimit=$MaximumSpectrumLimit DatabaseSearchRelativeMassDeviation=$DatabaseSearchRelativeMassDeviation FragmentPeakMatchAbsoluteMassDeviation=$FragmentPeakMatchAbsoluteMassDeviation FragmentPeakMatchRelativeMassDeviation=$FragmentPeakMatchRelativeMassDeviation MetFragScoreTypes=$MetFragScoreTypes MetFragScoreWeights=$MetFragScoreWeights MetFragPreProcessingCandidateFilter=$MetFragPreProcessingCandidateFilter MetFragPostProcessingCandidateFilter=$MetFragPostProcessingCandidateFilter IgnoreEmptyParameters=True"; java -jar /usr/local/bin/MetFragParameterExport.jar InputFile=$mzmlfile OutputFile=/$outfolder MetFragDatabaseType=$MetFragDatabaseType ChemSpiderToken=$ChemSpiderToken MaximumSpectrumLimit=$MaximumSpectrumLimit DatabaseSearchRelativeMassDeviation=$DatabaseSearchRelativeMassDeviation FragmentPeakMatchAbsoluteMassDeviation=$FragmentPeakMatchAbsoluteMassDeviation FragmentPeakMatchRelativeMassDeviation=$FragmentPeakMatchRelativeMassDeviation MetFragScoreTypes=$MetFragScoreTypes MetFragScoreWeights=$MetFragScoreWeights MetFragPreProcessingCandidateFilter=$MetFragPreProcessingCandidateFilter MetFragPostProcessingCandidateFilter=$MetFragPostProcessingCandidateFilter IgnoreEmptyParameters=True;

param.name: mzmlfile
param.label: Input file with peak list in mzml format

param.name: MetFragDatabaseType
param.label: Database
param.help: Database to which queries are sent.

param.name: ChemSpiderToken
param.label: ChemSpider token
param.help: ChemSpider token needed to access ChemSpider database.

param.name: DatabaseSearchRelativeMassDeviation
param.label: Relative mass deviation for database search
param.help: Relative mass deviation used for database search.

param.name: FragmentPeakMatchAbsoluteMassDeviation
param.label: Fragment peak match absolute mass deviation
param.help: Absolute mass deviation for fragment peaks to be matched.

param.name: FragmentPeakMatchRelativeMassDeviation
param.label: Fragment peak match relative mass deviation
param.help: Relative mass deviation for fragment peaks to be matched.

param.name: MetFragScoreWeights
param.label: MetFrag Score Weights
param.help: Weight used for scoring in MetFrag.

param.name: MetFragPreProcessingCandidateFilter
param.label: Pre-processing candidate filter
param.help: Candidate filter used before candidates are processed.

param.name: MetFragPostProcessingCandidateFilter
param.label: Post-processing candidate filter
param.help: Candidate filter used after candidates were processed.

tool.help: Converts a mzML file to parameters used directly as input for MetFrag.
